## OWebRouter.replaceHistory() method

Replace the current history.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
replaceHistory(url: string, state: ORouteStateObject, title?: string): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  url | string | the url |
|  state | [ORouteStateObject](./oweb.oroutestateobject.md) | the history state |
|  title | string | <i>(Optional)</i> the window title |

this
